boardgame.name: Money
Money!
Pan tu nie stał! Cinkciarz
史錢時代
金錢本色 (金钱本色)
boardgame.description: The object of this Reiner Knizia card game is to collect as many of one type of currency as possible. Players bid cards from their hands to exchange for 'lots' of cards, with the order being determined by whoever put out the highest valued cards. The cards themselves are renditions of currencies from around the world._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: ++++++++USA SPECIAL+++++++++++ 2 to 5 day shipping to the USA only $ 4.30 as Priority mail with delivery confirmation. Next available shipping windows: 09/22 - 09/30 - 10/08 Please feel free to ask if you need more details. FRED Distribution (FDD 101082N) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Fast, fun, exciting, interesting, and probably one of the prettiest card games I own._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; BGG Reviewer _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Simply put: Money is still one of the best Reiner games to date._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Dan Marsowicz, Platinum Game Reviewer Money rules the world! It doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t matter whether you collect euros, dollars or yen as long as the exchange rate is in your favor. And the more you exchange, the more you can make if you plan carefully and keep your wits about you. For 3-5 players, this 30 minute game provides an enthralling experience for families and gamers alike. Now published with beautiful new art, Money is a necessary part of any game collection for multiple reasons: 1.) It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a blast! Reiner_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s trademark combination of simple rules that provide for deep strategy and devilish intrigue works perfectly in this game. It can be quickly taught and used as a filler between longer games, or just as easily played over and over again with a running score and fill up an entire evening! 2.) It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s really educational! And we mean that in a good way. Ever wonder what faces/landmarks earned their place on a Euro? Or what Asian currencies look like? Money provides a truly fun way to memorize world currencies and learn more about the world around you in one game. Add on to that element the fact that younger players will be practicing hundreds of mathematical operations in their minds while planning their next moves, without even knowing it! Money has been called the math game for people who don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t like math because it reinforces basic concepts without ever letting numbers completely dominate the game. So whether it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s played with a group of gaming buddies or a family of four, Money represents the best in crossover experiences. Game Summary: The object of this gorgeous Reiner Knizia card game is to collect as many of one type of currency as possible. Players bid cards from their hands to exchange for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;lots_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; of cards, with the order being determined by whoever put out the highest valued cards. The cards themselves are beautiful renditions of currencies from around the world, with vibrant colors and designs on all of them, from American Dollars to Japanese Yen and many in between. Artwork by well-known Eagle Games artist Paul Niemeyer. Game Contents: 63 Bank Notes in 7 Currencies 6 Gold Coins 5 Play Money Cards 1 Rule Booklet

Money (Goldsieber), 0,2 Kg Condition/Zustand: new, unused and sealed / neu, unbenutzt und in Folie verpackt General Information: I sell this item as a private seller. I can not give any guarantees or refunds. Nevertheless as a board game collector I describe the item as accurate as possible. In case of missing tiles or damages I mention this in the item description. Diesen Artikel verkaufe ich als Privatperson. Eine Garantie oder eine Ruecknahme biete ich nicht an. Als Sammler von Brettspielen achte ich jedoch sehr genau auf den Zustand und auf die Vollzaehligkeit. Die Spiele sind daher meistens tadellos erhalten. Sollten Maengel vorhanden sein, werden diese auch in der Beschreibung unter _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Condition/Zustand_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; erwaehnt. Ich versende Spiele in folgende Länder: / I ship board games and board game expansions to the following countries: In case you live in a different country please contact me before you buy an item.
